attributes.action: Call a General Election within the next 3 months.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to the abuse and misuse of the current expenses procedures I ask the Prime Minister to call a General Election to allow the electorate to choose whether they wish those who have abused and misused the expeses claims procedure to remain in office.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
